Sizes listed are Fit Size & Fit Measurements from size 2 Length: 32in / 81cm, from shoulder Measurements Imported, China. Dry clean. Lining: 100% polyester. Trim: 100% leather. Shell: 66% viscose/25% nylon/9% elastane. Fabric: Mid-weight jersey. Tonal leather trim adds an edgy feel to this Nanette Lepore shift dress. Raised, perpendicular seams and 2 square pockets create a subtle geometric feel. Split V neckline. Hidden back zip. Lined. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Nanette Lepore produced her first couture look at age nine by outfitting a neighbor in a floral bedspread, beaded choker, and face paint. A lifelong love of fashion was born. Today, Nanette Lepore dresses are the very definition of timeless femininity, not to mention a beautiful fit. Expect bright colors, flirty ruffles, garden florals and sophisticated silks from this celebrity and fashion editor favorite. Nuanced Nanette Lepore shoes, jackets, and skirts round out a collection of delectable confections.
